Member FCDAnimation::GetChannels () const

Member FCDAnimationChannel::DEPRECATED (3.05A, GetCurveCount and GetCurve(index)) void GetCurves() const

Member FCDControllerInstance::GetType () const
Instead use: FCDEntityInstance::HasType(FCDController::GetClassType())

Member FCDEntityInstance::GetType () const
Instead use: FCDEntityInstance::HasType().

Member FCDGeometryInstance::GetType () const
Instead use: FCDEntityInstance::HasType(FCDGeometryInstance::GetClassType())

Member FCDGeometryMesh::GetPositionSource ()
Use FindSourceByType instead.

Member FCDLight::DEPRECATED (3.05A, SetOuterAngle and SetFallOffAngle) void SetPenumbraAngle(float angle)
Instead use: SetOuterAngle and SetFallOffAngle, or FCDLightTools::LoadPenumbra

Member FCDLight::DEPRECATED (3.05A, GetOuterAngle and GetFallOffAngle) float &GetPenumbraAngle()
Instead use: GetOuterAngle and GetFallOffAngle

Member FCDLight::DEPRECATED (3.05A, nothing) void SetHasMaxExtras(bool UNUSED(value))
Internal method, should never have been used.

Member FCDLight::DEPRECATED (3.05A, GetExtra()->GetDefaultType()->GetTechniques()) virtual bool HasMaxExtras() const
Instead use: GetExtra()->GetDefaultType()->GetTechniques()

Member FCDMaterialInstance::DEPRECATED (3.05A, HasType(FCDMaterialInstance::GetClassType())) virtual Type GetType() const
Use the following code, instead: entityInstance->HasType(FCDMaterialInstance::GetClassType()).

Member FCDPhysicsForceFieldInstance::GetType () const
Instead use: FCDEntityInstance::HasType( FCDGeometryInstance::GetClassType())

Member FUFile::GetHandle ()
Retrieves the OS-specific handle to the file. Using this function is not recommended.

Member FUObjectContainer::DEPRECATED (3.05A,"FUObject::Release()") bool release(const ObjectClass *value)
Use FUObject::Release instead.

Member FUStringConversion::ToPointList (const CH *value, FMVector3List &array)
Parses a string into a list of 3D points. Now replaced by ToVector3List.

Member FCollada::RegisterPlugin (FUPlugin *plugin)
Use GetPluginManager()->AddPlugin() instead.
